tool_description: Creates and manages snapshots of device states, allowing for quick restoration and baseline comparisons during testing.

device_ids.description: List of device identifiers to snapshot

include_app_data.description: Whether to include application data in snapshot

include_system_logs.description: Whether to include system logs in snapshot

error_messages: Snapshot creation failed: Unable to create snapshot for one or more devices
Snapshot name conflict: A snapshot with this name already exists
Insufficient storage: Not enough storage space for snapshot creation
Device access error: Unable to access device for snapshot creation
usage: Provide device_ids and snapshot_name to create device state snapshots, optionally configure data inclusion preferences.

snapshot_id.description: Unique identifier for the created snapshot

snapshot_devices.description: List of devices included in the snapshot

snapshot_size.description: Total size of snapshot in bytes
